title: Art aproved by Riot
body: I Would like to get on this page designs for and from Riot if they alow it. I build custom made solid wood furniture with the help of CNC router and as a LoL fan I would like to build Furniture from LoL Universe story. Can someone help me?

replies.body:
League-themed solid wood furniture? THAT SOUNDS AMAZING! Help & Support really isn't the best place for a post like this. I highly recommend reposting this to our [**Concepts & Creations Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts), where you'll find a lot of other really creative players who make cool stuff just like you! ^.^

I'm confident you'll get some great insight over on C&C. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
